name: Crystal Annihilation
description:
Defend the earth using the newly built cannon in the moon. Research technology, build buildings and establish stations to assist you in defending earth through 15 waves of earth destroying crystals.

Features:

-multiple enemy types

-soundtrack by wyatt. https://soundcloud.com/user-877764655

-pixel art by me

This project was made for the GM48 in earlier in April but it was unfinished and practically didn't work. After ample time reworking, bug-fixing and adding to the game, this is my first game I'm calling done. Thanks a lot to all the people who helped me, I had a lot of fun with this project and hope my next one works by the end of the game jam.
